name: SUITEN
description: The hotel summer suites (see example photos) usually have a bedroom and a separate living room. In some suites, our guests can look forward to the latest box spring beds.

name: DOUBLE ROOM COMFORT
description: Our double room comfort is approx. 20m² large. The rooms are functional but nevertheless cozy and charmingly furnished rooms. All rooms have a balcony with stunning mountain views.

name: DOUBLE ROOM SUPERIOR
description: Modern-alpine or new country house-style superior double rooms? Please tell us your taste and we will do our utmost to provide you your favorite room. Whoever first books first chooses

name: STANDARD DOUBLE ROOM
description: Our standard double rooms are about 18-20m². The rooms are functionally furnished and have a flat screen TV, telephone, radio, minibar and safe.

name: FAMILY ROOM
description: Size: 30-35m² - play-, living- and sleeping room for a whole family. Your children will be accommodated in a separate room with a bunk bed or two beds next to each other. For more space we will be happy to show you our family suites.

name: SINGLE ROOM
description: Single travelers, accompanying young people, the grandpa or the aunt feel comfortable in the cozy ambience of our beautiful single rooms.
